name: Precious One

weaponEffects.title: Frost Resonance
weaponEffects.description: Increase frost ATK by **15%** and frost resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more frost weapons. This set effect also works with weapons in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

weaponEffects.title: Elementalist
weaponEffects.description: Increase final damage by **1.5%** for every **1** type of weapon element equipped. This set effect also works with the weapons in the off-hand slot.

advancements:
When any weapon skill is used, Speedy Yo-yo can trigger **harmony**, dealing damage to nearby targets equal to **25%** of the Wanderer's lost HP. The damage dealt shall be no less than **120%** of the Wanderer's Max ATK, and no more than **800%** of the Wanderer's Max ATK. The type of elemental damage dealt will be that of the current weapon.
When any weapon discharge is used, Speedy Yo-yo can trigger **tuning**, dealing damage to nearby targets equal to **4%** of the Wanderer's Max HP. The damage dealt shall be no more than **400%** of the Wanderer's Max ATK. The type of elemental damage dealt will be that of the current weapon.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.

When using Desolate Day, Speedy Yo-yo can trigger **9** seconds of **swiftness**: Speedy Yo-yo's speed is increased by **80**%, damage is increased by **160%**, and damage caused by passing through the target is converted to small-area damage.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.
Increase damage of Speedy Yo-yo and Return to Loneliness by **50%**.
Increase final damage by **6%** while Speedy Yo-yo is active.

abilities.name: Withering Cold
abilities.description: While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 5 consecutive attacks.

abilities.name: Thaw
abilities.description: While airborne, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air, consuming endurance.

abilities.name: Piercing Cold
abilities.description: While using normal attack on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Piercing Cold, dealing damage equal to **345.1** of ATK + **18**

abilities.name: Sharp Chill
abilities.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using a Jetpack to trigger Sharp Chill.
While falling, deal damage equal to **57.5%** of ATK + **3** each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to **344.9%** of ATK + **18** and launch the target.

abilities.name: Dodge
abilities.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger a Phantasia, cooldown 15 seconds, reducing the speed of enemies within an area. Become immune to hitstun for **0.5** seconds while dodging.

abilities.name: Snowy Flurry
abilities.description: Tap normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (tap an arrow button before dodging) to trigger Snowy Flurry, dealing damage equal to **162.8%** of ATK + **9** to nearby targets.

abilities.name: Winter Solstice
abilities.description: Tap normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Winter Solstice, dealing damage equal to **162.9%** of ATK + **9** damage to nearby targets.

abilities.name: Desolate Day
abilities.description:
Deal damage to nearby targets up to **660%** of ATK + **35** and create 2 regulation Speedy Yo-yos. Cooldown: **60** seconds. Reduce the speed of targets within range of Desolate Day by **50%** (does not affect Wanderers or bosses).
Each Speedy Yo-yo passes through the center of the trajectory about 4 times in each motion cycle, dealing damage equal to **30%** of ATK + **2** to targets within the trajectory, for **70** seconds. The motion cycle lasts for 4 seconds when the weapon is O stars. During this period, using Desolate Day will refresh the position and duration of the Speedy Yo-yo. Cooldown: **4** seconds.
While Desolate Day is in use, reduce damage taken by **50%** and recover **5%** of Max HP. This cannot be affected by any healing boost effects. Recovery and damage reduction will not take effect in Apex League.

abilities.name: Return to Loneliness
abilities.description:
Use Capped Knowledge to obtain up to **2** uses of the new skill Return to Loneliness. This skill can only be used while Desolate Day is in cooldown. Deal skill damage equal to **440%** of ATK + **23**.
While the skill is in use, reduce damage taken by **50%** and recover **5%** of Max HP. This cannot be affected by any incoming or outgoing healing boost effects. Recovery and damage reduction will not take effect in Apex League.
While Fortitude Resonance is active: Use Return to Loneliness and taunt nearby targets to gain **1** stack of blocking shield, up to **3** stacks, for **20** seconds. Blocking points are equal to the **sum of the user's 5 resistance types**. When the blocking shield is used up or overflows, deal damage equal to **200%** of **blocking points** to the main target.
While Benediction Resonance is active: Using Return to Loneliness against targets with greater than **95%** HP will deal damage equal to **8%** of their respective Max HP (does not affect Wanderers). This cannot be affected by damage boost or reduction effects.

abilities.name: Capped Knowledge
abilities.description: When ***weapon charge is full*** or **Phantasia** is triggered, switching to this weapon from another **removes all debuffs from the wielder**, deals damage equal to **1,113.9%** of ATK + **59** to nearby targets, and launches the target. During this period, gain damage immunity for **1.5** seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

recommendedMatrices.name: Icarus
recommendedMatrices.description: Very high damage buff with over 100% uptime with Fractured Light's skill. Might be better suited on other weapons depending on your team.
